book.synopsis: Gemma finds the transition from being a glamorous child movie star to working as a student at a school for the performing arts requires hard work, but she also enthusiastically joins her cousins in honing their musical, dancing, and acting talents for a grand competition on television.Already a child film star, Gemma is concerned about her reception when she enters the Headstone School of Drama and Stage Training, particularly when she enters a television talent competition with her cousins
